title: mixing
content:
I am working on an identity that uses both Serif and Sans Serif typefaces, can anyone point me in the right direction of the threads dealing with this subject, as i’m sure there are do’s and don’ts and recommendations etc, thanks.

 [‹ Fonts from the Newspaper](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010144038/http:/typophile.com/node/18979 "Go to previous forum topic") [Typeface similar Monitor, but with Small Caps ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010144038/http:/typophile.com/node/18250 "Go to next forum topic")
author: R27
